test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_AllParametersMissing
test_cases.description: Tests that a BinanceConnectorException is thrown when all parameters are missing.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_OneParameterPresent
test_cases.description: Tests that no exception is thrown when one of the required parameters is present.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_AllParametersPresent
test_cases.description: Tests that no exception is thrown when all required parameters are present.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_NullParams
test_cases.description: Tests that a BinanceConnectorException is thrown when the params object is null.
